articles.title: China delays mission while NASA congratulates on Mars images - Phys.org
articles.description: China postponed a supply mission to its new space station on Thursday for unspecified technical reasons, while photos sent back from Mars by its newly arrived rover earned plaudits from NASA despite only sporadic contacts between the Chinese and American spac…

articles.title: 2022 Ford F-150 Lightning Electric Truck Revealed: America's EV - InsideEVs
articles.description: Ford has unveiled the F-150 Lightning, a powerful 4x4 electric truck that can power the job site or your entire house.
